meanings.sent1: Her desk looked uncluttered with only a few books on it.
meanings.sent2: The living room felt uncluttered after they removed the excess furniture.
meanings.sent3: The uncluttered closet made finding her favorite dress a breeze.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt uncluttered after a long walk in the peaceful park.
meanings.sent5: The uncluttered design of the room gave it a spacious and airy feel.

meanings.definition: Free from unnecessary items or mess
meanings.sent1: The kitchen counter looked uncluttered with only a fruit bowl on it.
meanings.sent2: Her email inbox felt uncluttered after she deleted all the spam messages.
meanings.sent3: The uncluttered garage made it easy to find the gardening tools.
meanings.sent4: His uncluttered schedule allowed him to relax and enjoy his hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The uncluttered beach was a peaceful escape from the busy city life.
